actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor Standards.

official_title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exempt certain individuals from the child labor provisions.

summary.text: Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to make child labor provisions inapplicable to individuals employed for any secondary school football game as: (1) a sideline official, if they are at least 12 years old; or (2) a ball monitor, if they are at least 11 years old.

titles.title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exempt certain individuals from the child labor provisions.
